languages.text: Атаки этого существа наносят {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненный урон{/g}. Цель выполняет {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и при провале получает {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature's attacks deal {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} and can inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} unless the target passes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.

traits.locale_text: This creature's attacks deal fire damage and can inflict burning for 1 round unless the target passes a Toughness resistance test.

This creature's attacks deal {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} and can inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} unless the target passes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.

languages.text: 此生物的攻击会造成{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}，并使目标{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。目标需要通过{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}才能不受影响。
languages.original_text: This creature's attacks deal {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} and can inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} unless the target passes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 此生物的攻击会造成{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}，并使目标{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。目标需要通过{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}才能不受影响。

languages.text: この生物の攻撃は{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}炎ダメージ{/g}を与えて1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃焼{/g}させることができる。ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に成功すれば避けることができる。
languages.original_text: This creature's attacks deal {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} and can inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} unless the target passes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この生物の攻撃は{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}炎ダメージ{/g}を与えて1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃焼{/g}させることができる。ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に成功すれば避けることができる。

languages.text: Los ataques de esta criatura infligen {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}daño de fuego{/g} y pueden causar {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} a menos que el objetivo supere una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature's attacks deal {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} and can inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} unless the target passes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Los ataques de esta criatura infligen {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}daño de fuego{/g} y pueden causar {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} a menos que el objetivo supere una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}.

languages.text: Die Angriffe dieser Kreatur fügen {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Feuerschaden{/g} zu und können {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennung{/g} für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} verursachen, es sei denn, das Ziel besteht eine {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature's attacks deal {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} and can inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} unless the target passes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Die Angriffe dieser Kreatur fügen {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Feuerschaden{/g} zu und können {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennung{/g} für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} verursachen, es sei denn, das Ziel besteht eine {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}.

languages.text: Les attaques de cette créature infligent des {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}dégâts de feu{/g}, voire l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}, pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, sauf si la cible réussit un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} lié à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature's attacks deal {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} and can inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} unless the target passes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Les attaques de cette créature infligent des {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}dégâts de feu{/g}, voire l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}, pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, sauf si la cible réussit un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g}.
